catalogue_raissonne:
Le Blanc 26
Mueller II undescribed
van Someren undescribed
description: portrait of painter identified as Anthonio Moro; half length turned right and glancing at viewer; thick curly hair, beard and moustache; wearing high necked doublet with spotted shirt and small ruff; laces of collar crossed over his throat; illustration from Walpole's "Anecdotes of Painting" (London, four volumes 1767-1771)
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

on sheet in black : Vol I. p.122 /  T. Chambars sculp / SR. ANTONIO MORE | on sheet in pencil: 2-91
title: Portrait of Sir Antonio More
